title: ROUGH COUNTRY
description: Beautiful Vicki Smith is a hostage in her own house as her sadistic husband Chief of Police Talon Smith uses his power to terrorize his town, but when the only man she ever loved comes back, Tim Ballenger may use his military training and lineage to fire up their old flames. Both men have hard intensions to capture and protect the woman who drives them wild with desire, but Idaho is a hunterâ€™s paradise, and Vicki Smith is the wild beauty they both swore to serve and protect. Its rough country and someone may lose their head deciding who mounts the trophy.
author: Alvin Slater
